title: Total brand value major sports leagues ( NFL , MLB , NBA & NHL ) 2013
summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Sports League, and Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) in each Sports League on the y axis.
The Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is highest at Sports League National Football League and lowest at Sports League National Hockey League.
There is a difference of 7571.4 between the maximum Sports League National Football League and minimum Sports League National Hockey League.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) for 4 number of Sports Leagues.
Sports League National Football League has the highest Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) and National Hockey League has the lowest Brand value (in million U.S. dollars).

max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Sports League, and Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) in each Sports League on the y axis.
The Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is highest at Sports League National Football League and lowest at Sports League National Hockey League.
The difference of Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) between the highest and lowest Sports League is 7571.4.

The Sports League National Football League has the highest Brand value (in million U.S. dollars), followed by Major League Baseball, and National Basketball Association. Down to the Sports League National Hockey League which is the lowest.
The Sports League National Hockey League tends to be 2.05 percent lower than average.
